name: Small Dark House Survival
description:
Introduction

This is an overhead, 2.5d barrage shooting game, a survival game with minimalist gameplay and roguelite elements
The protagonist enters the reincarnation of time and needs to resist 50 waves of attacks from different-dimensional monsters in order to escape.

How to play

Different-dimensional monsters include dragons, piranhas, and alien beasts, with close-attack and far-attack monsters.
After each attack, there is a 30-second preparation time, and you can purchase spells and attribute items.
As time goes by, there will be more and more monsters in different dimensions, stronger and more difficult.
Equipment drops randomly.
There are currently 20 kinds of spell props, with effects such as life, speed, attack, defense, multi-orb, crit, blood-sucking, etc.
